# portkey_prompts (Data Source)

Use this data source to get a list of Portkey prompts.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `collection_id` (String) Optional collection ID to filter prompts.
- `workspace_id` (String) Optional workspace ID to filter prompts.

### Read-Only

- `prompts` (Attributes List) List of prompts. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--prompts))

<a id="nestedatt--prompts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `prompts`

Read-Only:

- `collection_id` (String) Collection ID the prompt belongs to.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was created.
- `id` (String) Prompt identifier (UUID).
- `model` (String) Model used for this prompt.
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the prompt.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the prompt.
- `status` (String) Status of the prompt (active, archived).
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was last updated.
